Episode.GuestStars: |Alyssa Milano|Brian Doyle-Murray|Jack Sheldon|Louise DuArt|Meredith Scott Lynn|Olivia Hack|Ricky Blitt|
Episode.Overview: When Peter's toy company is bought out by the Eldorado Cigarette Company, the toys are used to market cigarettes to children. On Lois's advice, Peter confronts his new bosses about their evil use of toys and is unexpectedly made the CEO and dispatched to congress to convince them not to pass an anti-smoking bill.
